Notes.Text:
This update for xorg-x11-server fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-14361: Fix XkbSelectEvents() integer underflow (bsc#1174910 ZDI-CAN-11573).
- CVE-2020-14362: Fix XRecordRegisterClients() Integer underflow (bsc#1174913 ZDI-CAN-11574).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in X.Org Server before xorg-x11-server 1.20.9. An Integer underflow leading to heap-buffer overflow may lead to a privilege escalation vulnerability. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.
